name: Cinta
creator: Duviri
description: A beautiful longbow capable of firing devastating arrows or the wrath of the sun.

name: Plasma Rifle
creator: Nova Arms Corporation
description: Fires a concentrated burst of plasma energy capable of melting through the toughest armor.

name: Quantum Disruptor
creator: QuantaTech Industries
description: Disrupts the quantum cohesion of any material, causing it to disintegrate at the atomic level.

name: Sonic Blaster
creator: EchoTech Labs
description: Emits a high-frequency sound wave that can incapacitate or disorient targets without physical contact.

name: Laser Sword
creator: StarForge Inc.
description: A blade of pure energy capable of cutting through nearly any material with ease.

name: Nano Swarm Grenade
creator: MicroMight Defense
description: Releases a swarm of nanobots that can dismantle machinery and organic matter at a microscopic level.

name: Electro-Magnetic Pulse Cannon
creator: VoltTech Industries
description: Generates a massive EMP blast that can disable electronic devices and vehicles within a wide radius.

name: Graviton Hammer
creator: Gravitas Arms
description: Creates a localized gravitational field that can crush targets with immense force.

name: Dark Matter Rifle
creator: BlackStar Technologies
description: Fires a projectile composed of dark matter, capable of bypassing most forms of shielding and armor.

name: Photon Grenade
creator: Lumina Defense
description: Detonates with a burst of intense light and heat, capable of incinerating targets within a radius.

name: Cryo Launcher
creator: Frost Industries
description: Launches projectiles that explode into a cloud of supercooled particles, freezing targets on contact.

name: Goober Cannon
creator: Mark K. Willis
description: Launches silly little goobers at people. A great diversion.

name: Super Gun
creator: Red Guy Industries
description: Fires condensed supernovae at the target
